segments.text: I see the kitchen bathed in daylight from the open window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands drying dishes, her apron tied neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink runs steadily, filling up without her care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spills over, pooling on the tile floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She steps into the wet spot, continuing her work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a boy balances on a stool by the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He stretches to the cookie jar inside the open door.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister waits below, hand raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside remains serene and undisturbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a simple moment of daily life unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I feel a quiet worry about the unseen risks here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The innocence of it all tugs at my heart a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad interrupts this routine.
segments.speaker: PAR
